lead_paragraph: Martin Truex Jr., who earned his first Nascar Nextel Cup victory earlier this year, won his first pole yesterday. Truex, 27, turned a lap of 193.105 miles an hour at Texas Motor Speedway in Fort Worth to take the top spot for the Dickies 500.
snippet: Martin Truex Jr., who earned his first Nascar Nextel Cup victory earlier this year, won his first pole yesterday. Truex, 27, turned a lap of 193.105 miles an hour at Texas Motor Speedway in Fort Worth to take the top spot for the Dickies 500.
